snippet: A grenade thrown at worshipers leaving a mosque in a Somali neighborhood in Nairobi killed three people and wounded 15 on Friday evening, the city’s police chief said.
abstract: Grenade thrown at worshipers leaving mosque in Somali neighborhood in Nairobi, Kenya, kills three people and wounds 15; Kenyan troops moved into Somalia in 2011, prompting Shabab militant group in Somalia to vow to carry out revenge attacks inside Kenya.
lead_paragraph: A grenade thrown at worshipers leaving a mosque in a Somali neighborhood in Nairobi killed three people and wounded 15 on Friday evening, the city’s police chief said.
